channel.title: Windows 7 OS I converted to Exe. Still wont work!
channel.description:
Okay, I followed all the tut's know to man kind, and i have all of the converters, I use them on every 317 client and still it closes when I click.
This is so frustrating can someone please help me out.

item.title: Windows 7 OS I converted to Exe. Still wont work!
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft11 Microsoft1
item.description:
@Microsoft11 wrote:

Okay, I will give this a try. I sure hope it works, I’ve been trying to make my server 317 from 508 for 4 days now, I have people hounding me… Let me try it and see if it works. Thank you.

Okay, My RUN.BAT does not say “Program Files” it say’s this
@ECHO OFF
color 81
title Dragon-History Client
echo Dragon-History Client
echo Made by Aintaro
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

So, any other suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 OS I converted to Exe. Still wont work!

item.title: Windows 7 OS I converted to Exe. Still wont work!
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

  • = the name of the batch

Edit *.bat, and after you see “Program files”, add “(x86)” so… “Program Files (x86)”

Read full topic
